  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120777</entry>
          </identifier>

            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120777</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Lokacija slike,  točkovni vir</string>
            <string language="en">Image location, point source</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bildstandort, Punktquelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Emplacement d'image, source de point</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Posição da imagem, fonte do ponto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Posizione di immagine, sorgente del punto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέση εικόνας, πηγή σημείου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Localización de la imagen, fuente de la punta</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Usmerjen vir svetlobe oddaja vzporedne žarke skozi lečo.</string>
            <string language="en">Directed light source emits rays that start at the same point and are passing the lens.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">slika leče</string>
            <string language="en">lens image</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">goriščna razdalja</string>
            <string language="en">focal length</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">leča</string>
            <string language="en">lens</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verwiesene Lichtquelle strahlt Strahlen aus, die 
am gleichen Punkt beginnen und das Objektiv führen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La source lumineuse dirigée émet les rayons qui
commencent au même point et passent l'objectif.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A fonte clara dirigida emite-se os raios que 
começam no mesmo ponto e estão passando a lente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La fonte di luce diretta emette i raggi che 
cominciano allo stesso punto e stanno passando l'obiettivo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κατευθυνόμενη πηγή φωτός εκπέμπει τις ακτίνες που 
αρχίζουν στο ίδιο σημείο και περνούν το φακό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La fuente de luz dirigida emite los rayos que 
comienzan en la misma punta y están pasando la lente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Objektivbild</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">fokale Länge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Objektiv</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">image d'objectif</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">longueur focale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">objectif</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">imagem da lente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">comprimento focal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">immagine dell'obiettivo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lunghezza focale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">obiettivo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εικόνα φακών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εστιακό μήκος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φακός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">imagen de la lente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">longitud focal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">lente</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
